title.rendered: Fast growing Harrison Carloss picks a trio of top talent

content.rendered:
Harrison Carloss, the strategic marketing agency famed for its marketing know-how and creative output, has hired two new team members and promoted a third to swell the agency’s prodigious all-round skill set following sustained growth.

Tayler adds her considerable abilities as a Creative Designer, Selina strengthens our brilliant client services line-up, and Molly receives a well-deserved promotion to Account Manager.

After completing her degree, a stint in marketing told Tayler the fast-paced agency life was for her. She became concept lead with a marketing and design agency, developing her design talents on both print and digital including brand development and web design.

As a highly capable Account Executive with experience in busy B2B and third sector agencies, Selina’s passion is working with people and adding value to everything she does. Outside of work, Selina is currently also studying a BSc (Hons) in Business and Management with Derby University.

In moving up from Account Executive to Account Manager, Molly brings her considerable SEO and client liaison experience to the new role, and will now have the opportunity to use her already highly proficient project management and marketing abilities to develop clients’ digital strategies further.

Molly, Selina and Tayler will undoubtedly make a significant contribution to the agency, helping to further round out our in-house capabilities, besides augmenting an already impressive team of creative, web and digital capabilities, designers, developers, inventors, strategists, artists and storytellers.

Harrison Carloss’ Managing Director Adam Mobley commented:

“It’s always a real pleasure to have talented and highly motivated people join us whilst also recognising our existing team, especially as with their help I know we can continue to deliver the very best for our existing and new clients. The past year has already seen us enjoy sustained growth with a number of significant client wins after we weathered the storm of the last couple of years, we are now looking forward to the future of Harrison Carloss. The business will also be turning 50 this year so for all of us this is going to be the beginning of yet another exciting chapter for the agency.”

We’re an innovative and creative gang, passionate about launching and growing brands. Check out our vacancies page for the latest roles at Harrison Carloss.
